title: Direction of electric field given isolines

content.question: Which of the following vectors, if any, best shows the direction of the electric field at point <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow that points downward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow that points upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow that points upward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow that points downward and to the right.
None of the above; the magnitude of the field is zero.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow that points upward and to the left.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
